          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Asíntotas</string>
            <string language="en">Asymptotes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Asymptotes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Asymptotes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Asymptotes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Asymptotes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασύμπτωτοι</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de asíntota de la gráfica de una función. Se estudian gráficamente asíntotas verticales, horizontales y oblícuas.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concept of asymptote of the graph of a function. Vertical, horizontal and oblique asymptotes are studied graphically.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">asíntota</string>
            <string language="en">asymptote</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">oblícua</string>
            <string language="en">oblique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">horizontal</string>
            <string language="en">horizontal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">límite</string>
            <string language="en">limit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">gráfica</string>
            <string language="en">graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">vertical</string>
            <string language="en">vertical</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept von Asymptote des Diagramms einer Funktion 
zu erklären. Vertikale, horizontale und schiefe Asymptotes 
werden graphisch studiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le concept de l'asymptote du graphique d'une 
fonction. Des asymptotes verticaux, horizontaux et obliques sont
étudiés graphiquement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
o conceito do asymptote do gráfico de uma função. Os 
asymptotes verticais, horizontais e oblique são estudados gràfica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare il concetto del asymptote del grafico di una funzione. 
I asymptotes verticali, orizzontali ed obliqui sono studiati 
graficamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει την έννοια της ασύμπτωτου της γραφικής παράστασης
μιας λειτουργίας. Οι κάθετες, οριζόντιες και πλάγιες 
ασύμπτωτοι μελετώνται γραφικά.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Asymptote</string>
          </keyword>
